scripts.start: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && pm2 log enginx
scripts.run: docker build ./ -f script.Dockerfile -t enginxjs ; docker rm --force enginxjs ; docker run -it -v things:/program/output --name enginxjs enginxjs node node/index.js
scripts.enginx: docker build ./ -f enginx.Dockerfile -t enginx ; docker rm --force enginx ; docker run -d -v things:/program/output --name enginx enginx
scripts.commit: git add . ; git commit -m 'did I do that?'
scripts.push: npm run commit ; git push origin dev
scripts.everything: npm run push ; npm version patch ; npm publish ; npm run push
